name: Rede Alumni, Inc.
description: Developer of an education platform designed to connect students with educational institutions. The company offers a marketplace for finding scholarships and courses, a digital enrollment platform, a payment processing system, marketing and recruitment tools, data analytics and financial services, enabling students to find and enroll in higher education.
one_liner: Developer of an education platform designed to connect students with educational institutions.
